content: 6.3/10 M10 Powder cartridges (.25 caliber) Collated .25 caliber cartridges for use with powder actuated nailers ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti DX range of high-performance, reliable and versatile powder actuated fastening solutions Designed specifically for use with Hilti powder actuated tools as part of a matched tolerance system Applications Powder actuated fastening on steel, concrete and sand-lime block ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with (tools): DX 35 Cartridge type: .25 caliber short Approvals: CIP, PTB Technical Data | For use with (tools) | DX 35 | Cartridge type | .25 caliber short | Approvals | CIP, PTB | Cartridge strip capacity | 10 | Storage temperature - min. | 41 °F | Storage temperature - max. | 77 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 50115 - Cartridge 6.3/10 M .25 cal green bulk - Package Size 1000 pc - 50117 - Cartridge 6.3/10 M .25 cal red bulk - Package Size 1000 pc - 50116 - Cartridge 6.3/10 M .25 cal yellow bulk - Package Size 1000 pc
